thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com | 2 of 116
thread.title: Melissa

author: Melissa
title: Melissa
text: I ordered a 3-piece outfit for my 5 year old great niece because it was a great deal and was adorable. There was no delay in delivery and the return process appears to be easy if its needed. I don't need to return because the outfit is true to size and is very good quality. I also ordered her two pairs of high top shoes that she really likes. She was even asked by a parent at her dance class where she got the shoes. I will definitely order again.
